dct_title_s: PLANISPHÆRIVM PTOLEMAICVM, Sive Machina ORBIVM MVNDI EX HYPOTHESI PTOLEMAICA IN PLANO DISPOSITA
dct_description_sm: Ptolemaic system, with Earth at center of Universe, is illustrated, as are the elements of water, air fire and ether, and the zodiac names.

Koeman IV Cel 1(1); Burden 345 (Plate 345); The discovery of the world; Maps of the earth and the cosmos, p.69 / The David M. Stewart Museum, 1985; and Celestial charts, antique maps of the heavens, p. 12-13 / Carole Stott. -- London : Studio Editions Ltd.
Small map of northern hemisphere is at center, with California as large rounded island.
Title divided between 2 cartouches of scrollwork (top left and right).
Mapmakers and their assistants are shown (bottom left and right).

Issued in his: Atlas coelestis; seu harmonia macrocosmica (Celestial atlas of universal harmony). -- Amsterdam : Apud Joannem Janssonium, 1660. Chart probably issued in 1708 edition published by Valk and Schenk.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
